contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.frase: If you have any questions for us, feel free to send us a message and we will quickly respond to any questions you may have.
contactUs.name: First Name:
contactUs.succes: Thank you, your message has been sent! We will get back to you shortly.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.content: Debt Fix is a great company, even if it is 100% made up. This is for a final project for CIT 230 Web Development. But if this was a real company that it would be awesome, and this part would have some great information about it. It may even include a nice picture of our founder. That has been included below. But it is really just a picture of me!
aboutUs.pride: Man, that is one hot guy...
